name: forex-trading-companion
description: A comprehensive dashboard for Forex traders, featuring session tracking, journaling, analytics, AI-powered insights, and community features. Helps traders stay organized, analyze performance, and make informed decisions.

scripts.dev: echo "To run the app, open index.html in your browser. Ensure the API_KEY environment variable is accessible if running a local dev server that injects it, or that it's manually set if required by your setup." && exit 1
